{{Infobox road |province=MB |type=PR |route=283 |marker_image=[[Image:Manitoba283.png|150px]] |length_km= |direction_a=West |direction_b=East |terminus_a=Manitoba - [[Saskatchewan]] provincial border {{SK hwy tiny shield|provincial|9|align=left}}[[Saskatchewan Highway 9|SK Hwy 9]] |terminus_b=
[[Manitoba Highway 10|Manitoba Highway 10 (PTH 10) ]]
[[Manitoba Highway 10|PTH 10]] at [[The Pas, Manitoba|The Pas]] |cities=[[The Pas, Manitoba|The Pas]] |established= |previous_type=PR |previous_route=282 |next_type=PR |next_route=284 }} The '''Manitoba Provincial Road 283''' is a provincial road in [[Manitoba]], [[Canada]] which starts at the [[Saskatchewan]]- [[Manitoba]] provinical border [[Saskatchewan Highway 9]] and terminates at [[Manitoba Highway 10|Manitoba Highway PTH 10]] at [[The Pas, Manitoba|The Pas]]. The highway is a part of the '''[[Northern Woods and Water Route]].'''{{cite map |publisher = Microsoft Corporation Redmond Washington |title = Microsoft Streets and Tips |url = |edition = 2004 |section = |accessdate = 2008-02-10}}{{cite web | url = http://www.planetware.com/canada/northern-woods-and-water-route-cdn-bc-nwwr.htm | title = Northern Woods and Water Route, Canada | date =1995-2009 | publisher = PlanetWare Inc }} ==References== {{Reflist}} {{MBHighways}} [[Category:Manitoba provincial highways|283]] {{Manitoba-road-stub}}
